getHeaderCellFont

public com.lowagie.text.Font getHeaderCellFont()
Create either the default helvetica 12 point font, or specify the font name and encoding in the preferences. Either way it will use the header font color.

The preference settings are the following: export.pdf.fontName export.pdf.fontEncoding

getCellFont

public com.lowagie.text.Font getCellFont()
Create either the default helvetica 12 point font, or specify the font name and encoding in the preferences.

The preference settings are the following: export.pdf.fontName export.pdf.fontEncoding
